reference.title: kindlegenArgs Ant parameter
reference.shortdesc: Specifies additional command-line parameters for the kindlegen command-line tool.

section.p: One or more command-line parameters for the kindlegen command.
You can get the list of available options by running the kindlegen command with no parameters.

The kindlegen command changed from version 1.1 to 1.2 such that the "-unicode" parameter used in version 1.1 is not supported in 1.2. If you need to use kindlegen version 1.1, set the value of kindlegenArgs to the value "-unicode".
